description: This Dart source file defines the 'Event' class used for representing calendar events within the application, including properties such as id, title, description, start/end times, all-day flag, reminder settings, and creator ID. It includes serialization methods to convert from/to maps, as well as a copyWith method for immutability.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: A class representing a calendar event with optional reminder offset and serialization capabilities.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Event instance with optional properties replaced.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Event object into a Map for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates an Event instance from a Map.
